import React from 'react' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; function Modal({visible,onClose,name}) { const Navigate=useNavigate(); if(!visible) return null; return ( (name!==""?

Thankful Message

Thank you {name} for contact us.

Wish you all the best. 

Stay safe!🧡

:null) ) } export default Modal
